member.name: T:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerOAuthBearerAuthenticationOptions
member.summary: Options that wraps OAuth2BearerAuthenticationOptions for local and remote token validation

member.name: P:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerOAuthBearerAuthenticationOptions.TokenProvider
member.summary: Gets or sets the token provider (set this if the access token is NOT on the authorization header using a Bearer scheme.

member.name: P:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerOAuthBearerAuthenticationOptions.LocalValidationOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the local validation options.

member.name: P:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerOAuthBearerAuthenticationOptions.EndpointValidationOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the endpoint validation options.

member.name: T:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerBearerTokenAuthenticationOptions
member.summary: Configures identity server token validation

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerBearerTokenAuthenticationOptions.Authority
member.summary: Gets or sets the base address of identity server (required)

member.name: P:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerBearerTokenAuthenticationOptions.IssuerName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the issuer (if you don't want to use the discovery document).

member.name: P:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerBearerTokenAuthenticationOptions.SigningCertificate
member.summary: Gets or sets the signing certificate (if you don't want to use the discovery document).

member.name: P:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerBearerTokenAuthenticationOptions.ValidationMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the validation mode.

member.name: P:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerBearerTokenAuthenticationOptions.BackchannelHttpHandler
member.summary: Gets or sets the backchannel HTTP handler.

member.name: P:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerBearerTokenAuthenticationOptions.BackchannelCertificateValidator
member.summary: Gets or sets the backchannel certificate validator.

member.name: P:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerBearerTokenAuthenticationOptions.NameClaimType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the name claim.
member.value: The type of the name claim.

member.name: P:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerBearerTokenAuthenticationOptions.RoleClaimType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the role claim.
member.value: The type of the role claim.

member.name: P:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerBearerTokenAuthenticationOptions.TokenProvider
member.summary: Gets or sets the token provider.

member.name: P:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerBearerTokenAuthenticationOptions.ValidationResultCacheDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration of the validation result cache.
member.value: The duration of the validation result cache.

member.name: P:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerBearerTokenAuthenticationOptions.EnableValidationResultCache
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable validation result caching.
member.value: true if [enable validation result cache]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerBearerTokenAuthenticationOptions.ValidationResultCache
member.summary: Gets or sets the validation result cache.

member.name: P:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerBearerTokenAuthenticationOptions.RequiredScopes
member.summary: Gets or sets the required scopes.

member.name: P:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerBearerTokenAuthenticationOptions.PreserveAccessToken
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to preserve the access token as a claim. Defaults to false.
member.value: true if access token is preserved; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerBearerTokenAuthenticationOptions.ClientId
member.summary: Gets or sets the client id for accessing the introspection endpoint. In IdentityServer that would be the name of an authorized scope

member.name: P:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerBearerTokenAuthenticationOptions.ClientSecret
member.summary: Gets or sets the client secret for accessing the introspection endpoint. In IdentityServer that is the secret associated with the authorized scope.

member.name: P:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerBearerTokenAuthenticationOptions.IntrospectionHttpHandler
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP handler for accessing the introspection endoint.

member.name: P:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerBearerTokenAuthenticationOptions.DelayLoadMetadata
member.summary: Indicates whether the discovery metadata sync to be delayed during the construction of the pipeline. false by default.

member.name: P:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.IdentityServerBearerTokenAuthenticationOptions.IssuerSigningKeyResolver
member.summary: Gets or sets a delegate that will be used to retreive (s) used for checking signatures.
member.remarks: Each will be used to check the signature. Returning multiple key can be helpful when the does not contain a key identifier. This can occur when the issuer has multiple keys available. This sometimes occurs during key rollover.

member.summary: Creates a context token provider that wraps a user provided token provider.

member.name: M:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.ContextTokenProvider.RequestToken(Microsoft.Owin.Security.OAuth.OAuthRequestTokenContext)
member.summary: Invoked before the is created. Gives the application an opportunity to find the identity from a different location, adjust, or reject the token.

member.name: M:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.ContextTokenProvider.ApplyChallenge(Microsoft.Owin.Security.OAuth.OAuthChallengeContext)
member.summary: Called each time a challenge is being sent to the client. By implementing this method the application may modify the challenge as needed.

member.name: M:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.ContextTokenProvider.ValidateIdentity(Microsoft.Owin.Security.OAuth.OAuthValidateIdentityContext)
member.summary: Called each time a request identity has been validated by the middleware. By implementing this method the application may alter or reject the identity which has arrived with the request.
member.param: Contains information about the login session as well as the user .

member.summary: Enum for specifying where to validate the access token

member.name: F:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.ValidationMode.Both
member.summary: Use local validation for JWTs and the validation endpoint for reference tokens

member.name: F:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.ValidationMode.Local
member.summary: Use local validation only (only suitable for JWT tokens)

member.name: F:IdentityServer3.AccessTokenValidation.ValidationMode.ValidationEndpoint
member.summary: Use the validation endpoint only (works for both JWT and reference tokens)
